text: PARLIAMENT OF THE DEMOCRATICSOCIALIST REPUBLIC OFSRI LANKA
Printed on the Order of Government
PRINTED AT THE DEPARTMENT OF GOVERNMENT PRINTING, SRI LANKA
TO BE PURCHASED AT THE GOVERNMENT PUBLICATIONS BUREAU, COLOMBO 5
Published as a Supplement to Part II of the Gazette of the DemocraticSocialist Republic of Sri Lanka of December 04, 2015
Replacement ofthe First Scheduleto Act, No. 41of 2014.
AN ACT TO AMEND THE APPROPRIATION ACT, NO. 41 OF 2014
BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic SocialistRepublic of Sri Lanka as follows :
1.This Act may be cited as the Appropriation(Amendment) Act, No. 15 of 2015.

2.The First Schedule to the Appropriation Act, No. 41 of2014 (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) asamended by the Appropriation (Amendment) Act, No. 1 of2015 is hereby repealed and the following Schedule issubstituted therefor:
